Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Paul the Apostle:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te pieyouab m~makarioc: pencaq Pauloc pia~poctoloc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of the blessed Saint, our teacher Paul the Apostle, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
